scenario_text.value:
I’m supposed to be Aoi’s partner, but...
I couldn’t do anything.

Am I that useless to her? How can I make her
smile again?
(Labramon seems really upset about Aoi.)

(I wish I could do something to help her at
a time like this...)

(If it were me...seeing Agumon acting
cheerful as always would put me at ease.)

(But maybe having someone staying quietly by
her side is just what Aoi needs.)
(What should I say to Labramon?)
Do what you always do.
No need for words.

Shouldn’t you just do what you always do,
Labramon?

Having someone you know and love doing their
thing around you can be a comfort in itself.
But...she keeps pushing me away, you know?
Aoi doesn’t want anything to do with me...

Aoi is so sad and upset that she’s confused
right now.
All the more reason why she needs you.

I don’t know how to say this, but...maybe
there’s no need for words here?

No need...? So I should just clam up and stay
by her side?

It’s just...I think Aoi is having trouble
putting her feelings in order.

It’s only natural, after everything that
happened yesterday...

Getting stuck in your own head at times like
this brings nothing but bad thoughts.
I think you should be there for her.

Watch over her, so she doesn’t spiral into
somewhere worse.

But Aoi, she...will she accept me? If she
rejects me again, I don’t know what I’ll do.

We’ll figure it out together, if it comes to
that.

It’s times like this that we have to stick
together and do what we can.
Yeah... Yeah, you’re right! Thanks, Takuma!

I won’t hold back when it comes to Aoi! I’m
her partner, after all!
I’ll head to Aoi’s side!
